description:
This premium ski/snowboard bib for men is a comfortable bib made to prevent snow from sneaking in and make sure your pants stay put.

This medium high-rise zip-in bib is made in a 4-way stretch material and ensures comfortable protection. The bib protects the lower torso region from snow and wind leakage and keeps the pants in place.
name: Norrona Ski/Snowboard Bib - Mens

specs.value: The zipper length for matching the pants has these measurements per size
